itemDescription: British writer, opinion journalist and activist

wikipedia_page.main: Sharon Dodua Otoo (born 1972) is a British writer, publicist and activist. In 2016 Otoo was awarded the Ingeborg Bachmann Prize for her first short story in the German language.

response: thumb|Sharon Dodua Otoo – Winner of the Ingeborg Bachmann Prize for 2016
*:* Ingeborg Bachmann Prize: Sharon Dodua Otoo, Herr Gröttrup setzt sich hin
